decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - Commencement of development (Full Permission) - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - Approved Plans - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: Conservation Area Statement & Supplementary Scheme Assessment; 01/01; /01/02.
Condition : 3 - Restriction on Music/Amplified Sound - No music or other amplified sound generated on the premises shall be audible at the boundary of any adjacent residential building.

Condition : 4 - Restriction - Use of Premises - The premises shall only be used for Use Class E (b) to (g) and for no other purpose, (including any other purpose within Class E of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes Order) 1987), or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification.

Condition : 5 - Use of Premises - Prior to first occupation of the Use hereby granted, a scheme detailing which category of use Class E (b to g) shall operate from the premises shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local panning authority. The scheme details shall include which sub-category under Use Class E, the hours of operation and servicing details.

Condition : 6 - INFORMATIVE
Note to Applicant -Approved Schemes
In accordance with paragraph 38 of the National Planning Policy Framework, London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to the delivery of sustainable development, by:
1. Providing a formal pre-application advice service, details to be found on Planning pre-application advice service on LBM's website
2. Providing written policies and guidance, which is available to view on LBM's website.
3. Where appropriate, negotiating amendments to secure a positive decision.
4. Determining applications in a timely manner including providing a fast track service, details to be found on Get a quicker planning decision on LBM's website.

In this instance:
description: CHANGE OF USE OF EXISTING GROUND FLOOR OFFICE SPACE (CLASS B1a)  TO CLASS E (b to g)
